name: GL Inconsistency Error Solution
brief: Real-time tracking and analysis tool for diagnosing G/L Entry table inconsistencies during posting operations
description: A comprehensive diagnostic extension that helps Business Central developers and consultants identify and resolve G/L Entry table inconsistencies. Features real-time tracking of G/L entries during posting operations, detailed analysis views with balance verification, and easy start/stop controls for targeted troubleshooting. Essential for diagnosing posting errors, rounding differences, and transaction imbalances in multi-currency and complex posting scenarios.
